name: Children that died before 5 years of age per woman - based on Gapminder (2017)
title: Children that died before 5 years of age per woman - based on Gapminder (2017)
description:
Child mortality is the probability that a child born in a specific year will die before reaching the age of five, if subject to current age-specific mortality rates.

Child mortality was multiplied by fertility to obtain the data on how many children died on average per woman.

sources.name: Children that died before 5 years of age per woman - based on Gapminder (2017)
sources.additionalInfo:

Child mortality was multiplied by fertility to obtain the data on how many children died on average per woman.
sources.dataPublisherSource: Child Mortality (Select Gapminder, v10) (2017), Fertility Rate (Select Gapminder, v12) (2017)
